item.title: A simple algorithm to analize numerical variables
item.description: I created this simple algorithm to perform basic analysis of numerical data.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Diego Halabi, Doctor in Dental Surgery (DDS) and Doctor in Medical Science (PhD). I love to learn new hacking tools, and use them to improve my medical research. Some of my articles are in Spanish, because I develop educational material for my University, in Chile.
